name: Conformance to the Internal Revenue Code; general application
text:
For all decedents dying after January 25, 2012, as used in this chapter, "Internal Revenue Code" means subtitle B of the federal Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended as of December 31, 2013, as it applies to the determination of gross estate, adjusted gross estate, federal taxable estate, and generation-skipping transfers, except those provisions of the Internal Revenue Code and federal public laws that, pursuant to this chapter, do not apply or are otherwise limited in application. [L 2012, c 220, pt of §1; am L 2013, c 45, §2; am L 2014, c 44, §2]
 
Note
 
  The 2014 amendment applies to decedents dying or taxable transfers occurring after December 31, 2013.  L 2014, c 44, §5.
